fields.documentation: An identifier of container in which the Virtual machine has to be placed in
fields.name: container_id

fields.documentation:
Possible values are: 
   -  CONTAINER_TYPE_DATACENTER
,   -  CONTAINER_TYPE_CLUSTER
,   -  CONTAINER_TYPE_RESOURCEPOOL
,   -  CONTAINER_TYPE_FOLDER
,   -  CONTAINER_TYPE_HOST
,   -  CONTAINER_TYPE_VAPP
,
fields.name: container_type

value.documentation: Destination storage details to which virtual machine is migrated to
value.name: com.vmware.hcx.dr.model.replication_protect_request_storage

fields.documentation: Disk provisioning type to be used for the Virtual machine when migrated to destination
fields.name: disk_provision_type

fields.documentation: Datastore Id to which the Virtual machine disks to be migrated to in the destination
fields.name: datastore_id

fields.documentation: Destination side storage profile id to which the Virtual machine disks to be attached to the corresponding datastores.
fields.name: storage_profile_id

fields.documentation: Destination side storage profile name to which the Virtual machine disks to be attached to the corresponding datastores.
fields.name: storage_profile_name

fields.documentation: Destination side datastore name to which the Virtual machine disks to be attached to the corresponding datastores.
fields.name: datastore_name

fields.documentation: Destination placement details where the VM is migrated to
fields.name: placement
